fields.Title: Blue Planet II
fields.Summary: Take a dive into the deepest parts of the sea in a series that shows you the wonders of the ocean.

fields.Title: Forks over Knives
fields.Summary: Forks over Knives is a 2011 documentary about a pair of doctors' research into the direct relationship between diet and health and how adopting what is, in essence, a vegan diet

fields.Title: Advanced Style
fields.Summary: Advanced Style is a fun, spirited documentary about women of "a certain age" (62-95) living in New York City.

fields.Title: The Jungle Book (Animated)
fields.Summary: The Jungle Book is a Disney classic with positive messages for kids about friendship and finding family in unexpected places.

fields.Title: Howl's Moving Castle
fields.Summary: Miyazaki fairy tale with surreal villains.

fields.Title: Geniuses of the Modern World
fields.Summary: Historian Bettany Hughes retraces the lives of three great thinkers whose ideas shaped the modern world: Karl Marx, Frederick Nietzsche and Sigmund Freud.

fields.Title: Pinnochio
fields.Summary: Pinocchio is a Disney classic that easily passes the test of time for a beautiful and effective lesson on the perils of doing wrong when you know better.

fields.Title: Toy Story
fields.Summary: in Toy Story -- toys are separated from one another and from their owner

fields.Title: Tales from Earthsea
fields.Summary: based on the classic fantasy novels of Ursula K. Le Guin

fields.Title: Bethany Hamilton: Unstoppable
fields.Summary: Bethany Hamilton: Unstoppable is an inspirational documentary that chronicles how the young Hawaiian surfer (who was also the subject of the drama Soul Surfer) overcame a harrowing 2003 shark attack that cost her an arm and returned to the waves to become an international surfing competitor.

fields.Title: Top 10 Architecture
fields.Summary: Everyone loves a top 10, whether its your favorite TV show, your favorite film, a book, a restaurant.

fields.Title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
fields.Summary: Planes: Fire and Rescue is the superior 3D sequel to Planes.

fields.Title: 9/11: Truth, Lies, & Conspiracy
fields.Summary: Fifteen years after 9/11, this documentary looks into the theories surrounding the attack and investigates whether information is being withheld

fields.Title: Hidden Kingdoms
fields.Summary: This is a series about the tiny animals of the forest and jungles.

fields.Title: The World's Most Extraordinary Homes
fields.Summary: A celebration of extraordinary residential architecture from around the world with insight from an accomplished architect and his enthusiastic co-host.

fields.Title: Cars 3
fields.Summary: Cars 3 is part of Pixar's popular movie franchise about a world of talking, human-like vehicles.

fields.Title: The Who Was? Show
fields.Summary: Fresh voices bring some of the most famous names in history to life.

fields.Title: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure
fields.Summary: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure is about an argument between friends

fields.Title: Incredibles 2
fields.Summary: Incredibles 2 picks up immediately after The Incredibles, following the Parr family -- Bob/Mr. Incredible (voiced by Craig T. Nelson), Helen/Elastigirl (Holly Hunter), Violet (Sarah Vowell), Dash (Huck Milner), and baby Jack-Jack (Eli Fucile) -- as they again use their powers from their city

fields.Title: SuperNature Wild Flyers
fields.Summary: Learn about aerodynamics of flight by studying and watching the lives of birds.

fields.Title: Brain Child
fields.Summary: This educational series for younger children teaches them the science of the world.

fields.Title: Underwater Dreams
fields.Summary: Underwater Dreams is an inspiring documentary about how an underdog high school robotics team managed to take on M.I.T. and other college teams at a national competition in 2004.

fields.Title: Tiger: Spy in the Jungle
fields.Summary: David Attenborough narrates the lives of four growing tiger cubs using footage collected by hidden-camera-carrying elephants.

fields.Title: Wild North
fields.Summary: Look at the wildlife and nature in three different Norwegian biotopes

fields.Title: Nature's Weirdest Events
fields.Summary: Chris Packham examines some of the weirdest natural events on the planet. With the help of footage taken by eyewitnesses and news crews, he unravels the facts behind each story.

fields.Title: Aladdin (2019)
fields.Summary: Aladdin is Disney's live-action adaptation of its own 1992 animated classic

fields.Title: Gnomeo & Juliet
fields.Summary: Gnomeo & Juliet is a Shakespeare-inspired animated comedy that features some of the same overall themes as Romeo and Juliet, minus most of the bloodshed and the tragic ending.

fields.Title: Knock Down the House
fields.Summary: Down the House follows the primary campaigns of four women -- Cori Bush (Missouri), Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (New York), Paula Jean Swearengin (West Virginia), and Amy Vilela (Nevada) -- as they fight to win Democratic nominations for congressional office.

fields.Title: The Pixar Story
fields.Summary: Get a behind-the-scenes look at the history and creation of a company that has made some of the most loved children’s movies.

fields.Title: Dumbo (2019)
fields.Summary: Dumbo is director Tim Burton's live-action take on Disney's 1941 animated classic about everyone's favorite flying elephant.

fields.Title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia
fields.Summary: Get an up-close look at Australia's deadliest creatures in this series that features interviews with wildlife experts and survivors of attacks.

fields.Title: Matt Shepard is a Friend of Mine
fields.Summary: Matt Shepard Is a Friend of Mine explores the life and tragic death of a young gay man, including the aftermath of his terrible hate-crime murder.

fields.Title: Virunga
fields.Summary: A team of brave individuals risk their lives to protect the last mountain gorillas.

fields.Title: Moana
fields.Summary: Moana is an animated Disney adventure about a Polynesian island chief's daughter who sets off on a quest to save her people.

fields.Title: Citizenfour
fields.Summary: Citizenfour is a 2014 Oscar-winning documentary covering the tension-filled days before, during, and after whistleblower Edward Snowden revealed the depth and extent of NSA/U.S. government surveillance of its own citizens as well as citizens in many other countries.

fields.Title: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
fields.Summary: In DUCK TALES THE MOVIE: TREASURE OF THE LOST LAMP, Scrooge McDuck and his nephews Huey, Dewey, and Louie, along with Webby, a young female member of the duck clan (all continuing characters in the DuckTales television series), find themselves on a quest to find an ancient treasure.

fields.Title: The Lion King (2019)
fields.Summary: The Lion King is an extremely realistic computer-animated remake of Disney's beloved 1994 original.

fields.Title: Toy Story 2
fields.Summary: The plot again finds the toys banding together to rescue a fellow toy in peril

fields.Title: Earth's Natural Wonders
fields.Summary: See how humans survive in some of the world’s most beautiful, yet harshest, environments.

fields.Title: Inside Out
fields.Summary: Inside Out is an outstandingly original, heartfelt story from Pixar about growing up and learning to handle your biggest emotions.

fields.Title: Planet Earth II
fields.Summary: Travel through the earth and see natural wonders hardly touched by humans.

fields.Title: What the Health
fields.Summary: This documentary discusses links between diet and disease and talks about healthcare and the pharmaceutical and food industries.

fields.Title: Zootopia
fields.Summary: Zootopia is a clever, fast-paced animated Disney film set in a world of walking, talking, clothed animals that live peacefully together, having supposedly evolved past nature's rules of predator versus prey.

fields.Title: Wasteland
fields.Summary: Waste Land explores the challenging lives of incredibly poor people who work in an enormous bleak, smelly landfill outside of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

fields.Title: Animal Fight Night
fields.Summary: Animal Fight Night features battles between some of the biggest, baddest and often surprising fighters in the wild.

fields.Title: Happy People: A Year in the Taiga
fields.Summary: A documentary depicting the life and work of the trappers of Bakhtia, a village in the heart of the Siberian Taiga, where daily life has changed little in over a century.

fields.Title: The Champions
fields.Summary: The Champions tells the inspiring story of the dogs who were left behind when NFL star Michael Vick's dog-fighting ring was shut down.

fields.Title: Keepers of the Game
fields.Summary: Keepers of the Game is a 2016 sports documentary about a high school female lacrosse team that forms in the Akwesasne Mohawk Territory

fields.Title: Cinderella (animated)
fields.Summary: Cinderella is a Disney classic that families can enjoy together.

fields.Title: BBC: Life
fields.Summary: Our planet is teeming with myriad life forms, both plant and animal, all interlocked in a struggle for survival.

fields.Title: Peter Pan
fields.Summary: J.M. Barrie’s classic story of the flying boy who never grows up has been one of the most frequently adapted stories out there since it premiered in 1904.

fields.Title: Beauty & the Beast
fields.Summary: Beauty and the Beast is one of Disney's most beloved "princess" stories -- and the first animated film to be nominated for a Best Picture Oscar.

fields.Title: The Mars Generation
fields.Summary: Follow a group of teens at NASA’s “space camp” as they dream about traveling to Mars.

fields.Title: Icarus
fields.Summary: Icarus is a 2017 documentary about the vast scope of doping in amateur sports.

fields.Title: Aquarela
fields.Summary: Aquarela is a documentary about the immense power of water, demonstrating how humans are insignificant compared to it, especially in this age of climate change.

fields.Title: Nature's Great Events
fields.Summary: Watch spectacular wildlife events with this TV series that shows how changing seasons and events affect the animal world.

fields.Title: Fantasia
fields.Summary: Fantasia is a very early animated film (1940) contains numerous sequences in which the combination of ominous, dark music and violent, scary visuals could be frightening to very young or very sensitive kids.

fields.Title: Brain Games
fields.Summary: Games, illusions, and experiments give insight into how our brains create our vision of reality.

fields.Title: Weird Wonders of the World
fields.Summary: Members of the BBC's "Life" production crew go behind the scenes to explain just what it took to capture key sequences of the program.

fields.Title: Winnie the Pooh
fields.Summary: Winnie the Pooh is as sweet and gentle as the original Disney cartoons, making it accessible for even the youngest movie-goers (and a fine pick for little ones' first movie).

fields.Title: RENT
fields.Summary: Jonathan Larson’s Rent updates the story of Puccini’s La Boheme, setting it in New York City's East Village.

fields.Title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
fields.Summary: The Hunchback of Notre Dame is a 1996 Disney animated feature based on the Victor Hugo novel.

fields.Title: Hoop Dreams
fields.Summary: Hoop Dreams is a three-hour-long documentary film that features a lot of intense discussion by two young men about their experiences with parental separation and divorce, familial drug use, extreme poverty, sport-related injury, urban blight and violence, and teen pregnancy, all while they're trying to earn college basketball scholarships.

fields.Title: Treasure Island
fields.Summary: Treasure Planet is a swashbuckling pirate adventure in outer space that is a delight for kids

fields.Title: Most Valuable Players
fields.Summary: Most Valuable Players, a documentary, follows three Pennsylvania and New Jersey high school musical productions from rehearsal to performance and then to a three-county awards competition.

fields.Title: Pete's Dragon (2016)
fields.Summary: Pete's Dragon is a delightful remake of Disney's 1977 live-action/animated classic.

fields.Title: Coco
fields.Summary: Coco is a vibrant Disney/Pixar film that explores the traditions of the Day of the Dead, a child's desire to become a musician despite his family's wishes, and the power of unconditional love.

fields.Title: The Pirate Fairy
fields.Summary: The movie focuses on what happens when one of the beloved fairies "goes rogue" and joins forces with pirates from Skull Rock to become the titular Pirate Fairy.

fields.Title: The Farthest: Voyager in Space
fields.Summary: This documentary chronicles NASA’s 1977 launch of two space probes, created to send pictures and data about the furthest reaches of space back to earth.

fields.Title: Dinosaur
fields.Summary: Dinosaur is a Disney film set in prehistoric times that is filled with battles to the death, vicious predators, and heroes frequently in danger from both nature and enemy species

fields.Title: Forces of Nature
fields.Summary: Learn about shapes, elements, color, and motion in this docuseries about the forces governing our world.

fields.Title: The Breadwinner
fields.Summary: The Breadwinner is a beautifully animated drama from the co-director of The Secret of Kells that's set in post-Taliban Afghanistan.

fields.Title: Bully
fields.Summary: Bully is a no-holds-barred documentary that intimately portrays bullying victims' daily lives.

fields.Title: Mulan
fields.Summary: Mulan is a decidedly Disneyfied take on a Chinese fairy tale, elements of Chinese culture and history ring true.

fields.Title: Desert Runners
fields.Summary: Desert Runners is a documentary that spotlights four competitors in a series of grueling 250K marathon races held in death-defying deserts on our planet.

fields.Title: Strange Magic
fields.Summary: Strange Magic is an animated musical loosely based on Shakepseare's A Midsummer Night's Dream.

fields.Title: National Parks Adveture
fields.Summary: National Parks Adventure is a 3D/IMAX documentary film that celebrates the centennial of the National Parks Service.

fields.Title: Newsies
fields.Summary: Based on the 1992 film of the same name, Disney’s Newsies tells the story of the real-life New York City newsboys strike of 1899.

fields.Title: Wild Arabia
fields.Summary: Discover the changing landscapes of Arabia that are rich in both history and beauty.

fields.Title: The Most Dangerous Year
fields.Summary: The Most Dangerous Year is a documentary about transgender rights. It was mostly filmed in 2016, when a number of anti-trans bills were being debated in various states.

fields.Title: On the Way to School
fields.Summary: On the Way to School is a 2013 documentary in which four kids from different parts of the world -- Kenya, Morocco, Argentina, and India -- are filmed traveling tremendous lengths over difficult terrain to attend school.

fields.Title: Klaus
fields.Summary: Klaus is an animated holiday comedy about a possible origin story for Santa.

fields.Title: Into the Woods
fields.Summary: This mash-up of fairytales that dares to go beyond “happily ever after” is one of Sondheim’s most accessible works, and has certainly been the Sondheim entry point for more than a few theatre fans, largely due to the video of the original Broadway production with the original Broadway cast, including Bernadette Peters and Joanna Gleasonin her Tony-winning performance.

fields.Title: The Biggest Little Farm
fields.Summary: The Biggest Little Farm is a poignant, multi-year-spanning documentary about Southern California filmmaker John Chester (an Emmy-winning documentarian) and his wife, personal chef Molly Chester, who embark on a journey to go back to the land and run a traditional farm.

fields.Title: Company
fields.Summary: Instead of offering a linear plot, Company explored the concept of marriage through a series of scenes between Bobby, a 35-year-old bachelor, and a variety of his married friends.

fields.Title: Nature: Animals with Cameras
fields.Summary: Cameras attached to nine different species provide an interesting glimpse into animals’ lives.

fields.Title: Peter Pan (animated)
fields.Summary: Peter Pan is Disney's classic take on J.M. Barrie's story of the Boy Who Won't Grow Up.

fields.Title: Spies in Disguise
fields.Summary: Spies in Disguise is an animated buddy comedy featuring the voices of Will Smith as Lance Sterling, a Bond-like American superspy, and Tom Holland as Walter Beckett, a gadget-happy inventor.

fields.Title: The Rescuers Down Under
fields.Summary: The Rescuers Down Under is a 1990 sequel to The Rescuers.

fields.Title: Dancing in Jaffa
fields.Summary: Dancing in Jaffa is a documentary about a ballroom dance teacher returning to his home in Israel to teach

fields.Title: Nazi Mega Weapoms
fields.Summary: An examination of Nazi Germany's various military engineering projects during World War II.

fields.Title: Edge of the Universe
fields.Summary: Understand some of the mysteries of space as scientists reveal secrets about comets, asteroids, and other cosmic mysteries.

fields.Title: Can You Dig This?
fields.Summary: Can You Dig This? is a documentary set in South Central Los Angeles, California, an infamously gang-plagued, often violent conglomeration of neighborhoods in which economically disadvantaged people struggle to survive.

fields.Title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
Fun and Fancy Free
fields.Summary: Fun and Fancy Free is a 1947 in-color Walt Disney animated compilation of two shorts, one about Bongo the escaped circus bear, the other a version of Jack and the Beanstalk adapted to feature Mickey Mouse, Jiminy Cricket, Donald Duck, and Goofy

fields.Title: How to Win the US Presidency
fields.Summary: This whimsical look at rough-and-tumble American politics examines the roll of money, religion and even ancient Rome on Presidential campaigns.

fields.Title: The Tigger Movie
fields.Summary: this movie deals with Tigger's search for his "real" family

fields.Title: Falsetto's
fields.Summary: William Finn and James Lapine’s 1992 musical Falsettos is actually a combination of two earlier one-act musicals, March of the Falsettos and Falsettoland. Together, they tell the story of Marvin, a gay man trying to navigate his relationships with his former-wife, their child, and his boyfriend, all against the backdrop of 1980s New York when all of this was completely uncharted territory.

fields.Title: Christopher Robin
fields.Summary: Christopher Robin stars Ewan McGregor as an overworked, grown-up version of the main character from A.A. Milne's classic books.

fields.Title: An Inconveniet Truth
fields.Summary: An Inconvenient Truth introduces complicated scientific, political, and social issues (most prominently, the arguments surrounding global warming and environmental pollution), which will likely go over the heads of the youngest kids.

fields.Title: Bears: Spy in the Woods
fields.Summary: Bears around the globe were observed in their natural habitat using specially designed and disguised cameras.

fields.Title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
fields.Summary: The Nightmare Before Christmas is an offbeat, stop motion-animated movie

fields.Title: If I were An Animal
fields.Summary: Let two siblings Emma and Tim take your young kids into the fascinating animal world. Recommended for ages 5-8.

fields.Title: Tyke: Elephant Outlaw
fields.Summary: This is the gripping and emotionally charged story of Tyke, a circus elephant that went on a rampage in Honolulu in 1994, killed her trainer in front of thousands of spectators and died in a hail of gunfire.

fields.Title: A Wrinkle in Time
fields.Summary: A Wrinkle in Time is director Ava DuVernay's adaptation of author Madeleine L'Engle's classic children's fantasy book.

fields.Title: Frozen II
fields.Summary: Frozen 2 -- the sequel to Disney's 2013 blockbuster -- continues the adventures of Arendelle's magical Queen Elsa (voiced by Idina Menzel); her kind sister, Anna (Kristen Bell); and everyone's favorite snowman, Olaf (Josh Gad).

fields.Title: Eating Animals
fields.Summary: his important but difficult to watch documentary (narrated by Natalie Portman) tells viewers about the grim practices of factory farms while suggesting that a better way exists.

fields.Title: Last Men in Aleppo
fields.Summary: A Syrian director and crew follows The White Helmets for one year in LAST MEN IN ALEPPO.

fields.Title: The Beginning of Life
fields.Summary: Discoveries in neuroscience can help us understand childhood development.

fields.Title: Alien Contact: Outer Space
fields.Summary: Many people think of Space as a quiet and desolate vacuum of emptiness, but new evidence reveals that space is rife with activity beyond our comprehension. J

fields.Title: A Brave Heart: The Lizzie Velasquez Story
fields.Summary: A Brave Heart is an inspiring, if sometimes intense, documentary about Lizzie Velasquez, who's fought tirelessly against bullying (both online and offline) ever since discovering a video of herself on YouTube titled "The World's Ugliest Woman."

fields.Title: Abstract: The Art of Design
fields.Summary: A look beyond blueprints and computers into the art and science of design, showcasing great designers from every discipline whose work shapes our world.

fields.Title: Amazing Interiors
fields.Summary: Tours through houses with interesting and special interiors.

fields.Title: She Loves Me
fields.Summary: 1963 musical about two co-workers who hate each other while unknowingly being romantic pen pal partners.

fields.Title: Make Believe
fields.Summary: Parents need to know that this engaging documentary about dedicated, goal-driven teenage magicians should inspire thought and discussion about the amount of work and sacrifice necessary to be successful in any endeavor.

fields.Title: Monkey Planet
fields.Summary: Zoologist Dr. George McGavin gives an in-depth look at the nature and lives of monkeys.

fields.Title: The Adventures of Ichabod & Mr. Toad
Monsters Inc
fields.Summary: Monsters, Inc. is about closet monsters, but from their point of view -- scaring kids is their 9-to-5 job.

fields.Title: Into the Inferno
fields.Summary: An exploration of active volcanoes around the world.

fields.Title: The World According to Sesame Street
fields.Summary: The World According to Sesame Street is a serious documentary. It's not a collection of skits from the kids' TV series, nor is it geared toward younger Sesame Street fans.

fields.Title: March of the Penguins
fields.Summary: Morgan Freeman narrates as the penguins make their annual trek from the Antarctic shore in Antarctica.

fields.Title: Storied Streets
fields.Summary: Storied Streets is a documentary about homelessness from 2014, originally titled These Storied Streets. I

fields.Title: Jiru Dreams of Sushi
fields.Summary: Jiro Dreams of Sushi is a documentary film in Japanese with English subtitles about Jiro Ono, a premier sushi chef who has gained great renown in his tiny restaurant in Tokyo.

fields.Title: The Pyramid Code
fields.Summary: Discover the scientific knowledge and technological advancement of one of the greatest civilizations in the ancient world: the Egyptians.

fields.Title: Race of Life
fields.Summary: Its a battle for survival, and the rush to stay one step ahead- a step that can be the difference between life and death.

fields.Title: Spider-man: Into the Spiderverse
fields.Summary: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse is a funny, original, action-packed animated Marvel adventure that centers on Brooklyn teen Miles Morales (voiced by Shameik Moore), who becomes a new Spider-Man and ends up meeting other Spider-people from parallel universes.

fields.Title: Wonder Women!  The Untold Story of American Superheroines
fields.Summary: Wonder Women! The Untold Story of American Superheroinesis a documentary about female superheroes and female heroism that would make excellent whole-family viewing, particularly for families with daughters.

fields.Title: The Beginning & End of the Universe
fields.Summary: Two documentary movies, the first discuss the theory of the beginning of the universe (big bang theory), while the other includes the ending theories.

fields.Title: Sleeping Beauty
fields.Summary: Sleeping Beauty, will be the prince's fight with the dragon; he fights with a sword and almost falls from a cliff.

fields.Title: A Plastic Ocean
fields.Summary: A PLASTIC OCEAN begins when journalist Craig Leeson, searching for the elusive blue whale, discovers plastic waste in what should be pristine ocean.

fields.Title: Monsters University
fields.Summary: Monsters University -- a prequel to Pixar's hit 2001 comedy Monsters, Inc. -- tells the story of how Mike (voiced by Billy Crystal) and Sulley (John Goodman) met in college.

fields.Title: Imba Means Sing
fields.Summary: Imba Means Sing is a documentary that follows 20 young members of the African Children's Choir (Number 39) on an 18-month tour of the United States, with stops in Canada and the U.K. Everything is seen through the eyes of the kids

fields.Title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
fields.Summary: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast is a more adventure-focused installment in the Tink series. It focuses mainly on animal fairy Fawn and features Gruff, a big furry monster who's lovable but also can be quite scary.

fields.Title: Spellbound
fields.Summary: Spellbound is a documentary that follows eight kids from different socioeconomic and geographic areas as they prepare for the National Spelling Bee in Washington, D.C.

fields.Title: The Jungle Book (2016)
fields.Summary: The Jungle Book is a live-action/CGI update of Rudyard Kipling's classic book of short stories that has many scary/intense scenes involving menacing wild animals.

fields.Title: The Royal House of Windsor
fields.Summary: The history of Britain's ruling dynasty, the Windsors, over the last 100 years, starting with the time around the outbreak of WWI.

fields.Title: Mission Blue
fields.Summary: Follow Sylvia Earle’s campaign to save a slowly dying ocean.

fields.Title: Mad Hot Ballroom
fields.Summary: Mad Hot Ballroom is a documentary that tracks students from three NYC public schools as they prepare for an annual citywide ballroom-dancing competition.

fields.Title: Dophins: Spy in the Pod
fields.Summary: The award-winning team behind Penguins - Spy in the Huddle use hidden cameras to go into the heart of the dolphins' world, offering the chance to encounter dolphins up-close

fields.Title: The Toys that Made US
fields.Summary: The minds behind history's most iconic toy franchises discuss the rise (and sometimes fall) of their billion-dollar creations.

fields.Title: He Named Me Malala
fields.Summary: Follow the journey of Pakistani girl Malala, shot for standing up for girls’ education, and her determination to keep fighting.

fields.Title: Inequality for All
fields.Summary: Inequality for All is an inspirational, information-packed, and often funny documentary featuring former Clinton Labor Secretary Robert Reich that aims to raise awareness about the widening inequality gap in America going back to the Depression but largely focused on the 1970s to today.

fields.Title: Wild China
fields.Summary: An in-depth look at some of China's most impressive natural sites such as the ancient Han kingdom, the Mongol steppes, the Silk Road and the Tibetan Plateau.

fields.Title: Nova: Black Hole Apocolypse
fields.Summary: This documentary uncovers some of the mysteries of the strangest phenomenon in the universe: black holes.

fields.Title: JFK: The Making of a President
fields.Summary: Explore how John F. Kennedy's worldview was influenced by his younger years, when he endured poor health, family tragedy and a demanding father.

fields.Title: Social Fabric
fields.Summary: Milleniall designer Kyle Ng travels the world to find out what certain garments, fabrics and clothing mean, its cultural significance, origins and its future.

fields.Title: Encounters at the End of the World
fields.Summary: Film-maker Werner Herzog travels to the McMurdo Station in Antarctica, looking to capture the continent's beauty and investigate the characters living there.

fields.Title: Joshua: Teenager vs Superpower
fields.Summary: Joshua: Teenager vs. Superpower is not, as the title might suggest, an action movie about a kid facing a comic book foe, but rather a documentary about a bright teen who takes it upon himself to help lead a youth movement against Communist China's takeover of his city,

fields.Title: Big Hero 6
fields.Summary: Big Hero 6 is an action-packed animated adaptation of the same-titled superhero comic

fields.Title: Under the Turban
fields.Summary: Under the Turban is a 2017 documentary about the Sikh religion.

fields.Title: Time for Ilhan
fields.Summary: ime for Ilhan is a documentary about Ilhan Omar's election to the Minnesota Legislature in 2016.

fields.Title: Fyre: The Greatest Party that Never Happened
fields.Summary: Fyre: The Greatest Party That Never Happened is a documentary that details the events leading to the Fyre Festival, a 2017 music event that was over-hyped, sold out ... and a complete fraud.

fields.Title: The Lion King (Animated)
fields.Summary: The Lion King is considered one of Disney's greatest animated musicals, but it does have some scary moments.

fields.Title: Mega Builders
fields.Summary: Capturing the biggest, most complex, most stressful and most dangerous engineering projects around the world, Megabuilders chronicles the most awe-inspiring construction projects in modern engineering.

fields.Title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
fields.Summary: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh is delightful classic film

fields.Title: Maidentrip
fields.Summary: Maidentrip is a 2013 documentary about a Dutch teenager named Laura Dekker who became the youngest person to sail around the world alone.

fields.Title: Inocente
fields.Summary: Inocente is a gripping, emotional firsthand account of homelessness and the immigration issue in America as told by a teen who's lived in the midst of it all.

fields.Title: The Real Death Star
fields.Summary: This documentary examines theories behind the creation of gamma ray bursts, destructive explosions in space that can wipe out entire star systems.

fields.Title: Toy Story 4
fields.Summary: Toy Story 4 is the fourth and probably final installment of Disney Pixar's original franchise.

fields.Title: Babies
fields.Summary: Babies -- which features four families from different parts of the world -- holds large appeal for both parents and children alike.

fields.Title: The Wheelchair President
fields.Summary: Find out how the failing health and marriage of Franklin Delano Roosevelt impacted the conclusion of WWII.

fields.Title: The West
fields.Summary: Uncover life in the 19th century American West with this documentary that shows what life was like for pioneers and natives trying to tame a wild country.

fields.Title: Tornado Hunters
fields.Summary: This multi-platform project consists of 5 webisodes, 2 TV pilots and a strong social media presence, including live feeds from the field.

fields.Title: Planet Earth
fields.Summary: Emmy Award-winning, 11 episodes, five years in the making, the most expensive nature documentary series ever commissioned by the BBC, and the first to be filmed in high definition.

fields.Title: The Rape of Recy Taylor
fields.Summary: The Rape of Recy Taylor is a powerful documentary about the 1944 gang rape of a black woman by white men and the victim's frustrating, fruitless pursuit of justice. Taylor's rape is described at length, albeit in clinical terms:

fields.Title: Wild Alaska
fields.Summary: Witness the great state of Alaska change as the seasons come and go and how animals survive through it all.

fields.Title: Africa's Deadliest
fields.Summary: Africa is a land sculpted by time where animals have evolved complex weapons to arm them in the battle to live another day.

fields.Title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
fields.Summary: The Secret Life of Pets 2 is the sequel to the 2016 animated comedy about what pets do when their humans aren't home.

fields.Title: Tarzan
fields.Summary: 1999 Disney animated movie

fields.Title: Mary Poppins Returns
fields.Summary: Mary Poppins Returns, starring Emily Blunt as everyone's favorite magical nanny and Lin-Manuel Miranda as her Cockney lamplighter pal, is a sequel to Mary Poppins, the Oscar-winning 1964 classic.

fields.Title: Liyana
fields.Summary: Liyana is a powerful, award-winning documentary about a group of African orphans who create a story as a form of creative therapy.

fields.Title: Life
fields.Summary: Delve into survival with this series that uncovers animal lives from insects to reptiles.

fields.Title: Far From the Tree
fields.Summary: Far From the Tree is a moving documentary based on writer Andrew Solomon's best-selling 2012 nonfiction book about parents who are raising children completely unlike themselves.

fields.Title: Print the Legend
fields.Summary: Follows the people racing to bring the hot new 3D printing technology to your home, documenting the "Macintosh Moment" of this revolution and exploring what it takes to live the American Dream.

fields.Title: Tarzan (2013)
fields.Summary: Live action film

fields.Title: The Reluctant Dragon
fields.Summary: The Reluctant Dragon is a delightful "behind-the scenes" look from 1941 at how Disney's animated features were made back then.

fields.Title: Trek: Spt of the Wildebeest
fields.Summary: Each year over 1.2 million wildebeest travel across the vast Serengeti plains and Kenya's Masai Mara on a 1,800 kilometer circular journey, relentlessly followed by every big African predator.

fields.Title: The Last Man on the Moon
fields.Summary: Hear from Gene Cernan as he talks about what it meant to be the last man to stand on the moon.

fields.Title: Liberty Kids
fields.Summary: each episode is a self-contained lesson in American history does nothing to diminish its entertainment value.

fields.Title: Pygmies: The Children of the Jungle
fields.Summary: The adventurer, Ivan Bulík, traveled all through Africa. However, one of his dreams still eluded him: He desired to capture the life and customs of the smallest people on Earth, to find the undisturbed civilization of Pygmies.

fields.Title: Martin Luther: The Idea that Changed the World
fields.Summary: Learn about a man who fought the beliefs of the Catholic Church in this docudrama about Martin Luther.

fields.Title: Piglet's Big Movie
fields.Summary: Piglet's' Big Movie includes three of A.A. Milne's original stories ("In Which A House is Built at Pooh Corner for Eeyore" "In Which Kanga and Roo Come to the Forest," and "In Which Christopher Robin Leads An Expedition To The North Pole") framed by the tale of Piglet's struggle to realize his purpose in life.

fields.Title: Maleficent
fields.Summary: Maleficent is Disney's retelling of its iconic animated princess movie Sleeping Beauty from the villain's point of view.

fields.Title: Lego House: House of the Brick
fields.Summary: In Billund, Denmark, a nearly 130,000-square-foot house inspired by the iconic LEGO bricks is constructed, capturing the awe of kids of all ages.

fields.Title: Pete's Dragon (animated)
fields.Summary: Pete's Dragon combines animation with live action for what is generally a family friendly film.

fields.Title: This Changes everything
fields.Summary: This Changes Everything (2018) is a well-researched, effective documentary about evolving women's roles in movies and television, both in front of and behind the camera.

fields.Title: The Longest Day
fields.Summary: The Longest Day, a black-and-white docu-drama released in 1962, is a predominantly accurate depiction of D-Day, June 6, 1944, when Allied troops invaded German-occupied Europe via the western coast of France.

fields.Title: I Am Bolt
fields.Summary: The life of world record holder Usain Bolt comes alive in this documentary about his athletic career.

fields.Title: Social Animals
fields.Summary: Social Animals is a documentary that puts Instagram and kids in sharp focus.

fields.Title: Africa
fields.Summary: Travel through Africa and learn how animals in different ecosystems live and survive.

fields.Title: Living on One Dollar
fields.Summary: Living on One Dollar is an inspiring documentary created by four college kids to show what it's like to live in poverty in rural Central America.

fields.Title: Homecoming: A Film by Beyonce
fields.Summary: Homecoming: A Film by Beyonce commemorates the 22-time Grammy-winning Queen Bey's headlining performance at the 2018 Coachella Music Festival -- which marked her return to stage after a rough pregnancy with twins.

fields.Title: Frozen Planet
fields.Summary: Journey through ice and snow to uncover the coldest areas of our world.

fields.Title: Planes
fields.Summary: Planes is an adventure that, like Cars, takes place in a world populated by vehicles.

fields.Title: The Blue Planet: A History of the Oceans
fields.Summary: A sequel to “Blue Planet” shows you the rarely-seen world under the sea.

fields.Title: The Secret World of Arrietty
fields.Summary: The Secret World of Arrietty is a charming and unexpectedly profound anime film from the Japanese studio responsible for movies like Ponyo, Spirited Away, and Howl's Moving Castle.

fields.Title: Dream Big: Engineering in Our World
fields.Summary: Dream Big: Engineering Our World is a 42-minute STEM-themed IMAX documentary about how engineers are responsible for important technological innovations that propel us into the future.

fields.Title: Buck
fields.Summary: Buck is a riveting documentary about horse whisperer Buck Brannaman, whose backstory features how he turned an abusive childhood into a unique understanding of horses.

fields.Title: The Good Dinosaur
fields.Summary: The Good Dinosaur -- Pixar's lush animated prehistoric saga that successfully melds Finding Nemo and E.T. -- has stunning visuals, moments of clever humor, strong messages about loyalty and bravery, and many scenes of danger, trauma, and peril that are likely to frighten younger/more sensitive viewers.

fields.Title: Dirty Money
fields.Summary: A Netflix Original Series documenting various stories about exposing the greed, corruption, and crime spreading through the global economy.

fields.Title: American Experience: The Circus
fields.Summary: Discover how the circus rose to become one of the world’s favorite forms of entertainment and why it slowly died out.

fields.Title: Tangled
fields.Summary: Tangled is a reimagining of the classic Rapunzel tale and a Disney "princess" movie that's sure to entertain both boys and girls.

fields.Title: Billy Elliott
fields.Summary: Elton John and Lee Hall’s Billy Elliot The Musical tells the story of a little boy in a small British town who prefers ballet to boxing, much to the dismay of his conservative working-class community.

fields.Title: Our Planet
fields.Summary: See our world’s natural beauty and the impacts of climate change in this extensive documentary that covers different ecosystems throughout the world.

fields.Title: Wreck-It Ralph
fields.Summary: The story is about a "bad guy" who deserts his classic arcade game to prove that he's not so bad after all, turning Disney's animated adventure into the tale of an underdog searching for a new identity.

fields.Title: Baby Animals in the Wild
fields.Summary: Learn about the natural world with this TV series that tracks baby animals through their daily lives

fields.Title: Miss Representation
fields.Summary: this documentary offers a powerful, uncompromising look at how the media trivializes and sexualizes women.

fields.Title: Captain Marvel
fields.Summary: Captain Marvel is the first female-led superhero movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

fields.Title: Behind the Curve
fields.Summary: Behind the Curve is a 2019 documentary about "Flat Earthers" and the psychology behind the belief in conspiracy theories.

fields.Title: Pick of the Litter
fields.Summary: Pick of the Litter is an upbeat documentary about training dogs to be service companions for the blind.

fields.Title: Mars Needs Moms
fields.Summary: this animated 3-D adventure comedy based on the book by Berkeley Breathed

fields.Title: Wonders of the Sea
fields.Summary: Wonders of the Sea is a documentary that captures some of Earth's most wondrous creatures in extraordinarily intimate detail.

fields.Title: Maiden
fields.Summary: Maiden is a documentary about the pioneering all-female crew of sailors, led by Tracy Edwards, who raced the titular boat in the prestigious Whitbread Round the World Race in 1989-1990.

fields.Title: Finding Dory
fields.Summary: Finding Dory is the sequel to Pixar's 2003 classic Finding Nemo.

fields.Title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
fields.Summary: How the Grinch Stole Christmas is an imaginative version of Dr. Seuss' beloved classic picture book, but it may be too intense and scary for the youngest or most sensitive kids.

fields.Title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Asia
fields.Summary: From fangs to claws to venomous stings, they all wield deadly weapons.

fields.Title: Elephants: Spy in the Herd
fields.Summary: Elephants: Spy In The Herd provides the most intimate portrayal of the everyday life of an elephant herd.

fields.Title: The Princess and the Frog
fields.Summary: The Princess and the Frog is Disney's first movie to feature an African-American heroine, Tiana. The New Orleans-set story is a spin on the classic fairy tale about the princess who finds true love when she kisses an enchanted amphibian, but there's more to this tale than just romance:

fields.Title: The Little Mermaid
fields.Summary: The Little Mermaid is based on the classic Hans Christian Andersen story and has some scary moments.

fields.Title: Elaine Stritch At Liberty
fields.Summary: In Elaine Stritch At Liberty, her 2002 solo show that played Off-Broadway at the Public Theater before moving to Broadway, Stritch takes you through her entire life, from childhood to Sail Away to Company, and beyond.

fields.Title: Who Will Write Our History
fields.Summary: Who Will Write Our History is a Holocaust documentary about an archive of personal histories kept by Jews facing death in the Warsaw Ghetto.

fields.Title: Anita: Speaking Truth to Power
fields.Summary: Anita: Speaking Truth to Power is a 2014 documentary about the woman who ignited a firestorm of controversy when she testified in front of the Senate Judiciary Committee that she was sexually harassed by Supreme Court Justice nominee Clarence Thomas.

fields.Title: Black Panther
fields.Summary: Black Panther is the first film in the Marvel cinematic universe to center on a superhero of color: African prince-turned-king T'Challa (Chadwick Boseman), aka the Black Panther.

fields.Title: The Lion in Your Living Room
fields.Summary: Learn all about the common household pet, the cat, in this documentary that explores multiple topics from its domestication to the science of a cat’s purr.

fields.Title: Growing Up in the Wild
fields.Summary: Five young animals discover how to survive in a harsh world. the Wild

fields.Title: World War II in Colour
fields.Summary: Recounts the events of world War II in color.

fields.Title: Melody Time
fields.Summary: Melody Time is a 1948 Disney movie

fields.Title: Bindi's Bootcamp
fields.Summary: A children's game show hosted by Bindi Irwin.

fields.Title: Mudbloods
fields.Summary: Mudbloods is a documentary about college students who play Quidditch, a sport originally created by J.K. Rowling in the Harry Potter books.

fields.Title: Dino Hunt
fields.Summary: Paleontologists uncover dinosaur fossils while working to discover an elusive new species.

fields.Title: American Factory
fields.Summary: American Factory is a documentary that recounts the initial efforts of a successful Chinese manufacturer -- Fuyao Auto Glass -- to bring its business to the U.S., hiring and training more than a thousand American workers in the process.

fields.Title: Alice in Wonderland (Animated)
fields.Summary: Disney's classic animated interpretation of Lewis Carroll's tale Alice in Wonderland

fields.Title: Beatles: How The Beatles Changed the World
fields.Summary: Investigate the impact the Beatles had on music and culture, then and now.

fields.Title: For Sama
fields.Summary: For Sama is an intimate documentary chronicling filmmaker Waad al-Kateab's life in Aleppo, Syria, during the country's civil war: first as a student during the Arab Spring in 2011 and then as a citizen journalist who falls in love, marries, and has a baby girl named Sama.

fields.Title: Oklahoma City
fields.Summary: Documents the beliefs and experiences of Timothy McVeigh in the lead-up to his bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma City, which claimed 168 lives.

fields.Title: Shake the Dust
fields.Summary: The Most Dangerous Year is a documentary about transgender rights. It was mostly filmed in 2016, when a number of anti-trans bills were being debated in various states.

fields.Title: Cinderella (2015)
fields.Summary: Cinderella is true to the classic Disney animated tale, if somewhat more intense given that it's live action instead of a cartoon.

fields.Title: Cowspiracy
fields.Summary: Cowspiracy is a 2014 documentary addressing how animal agriculture is the largest cause of pollution worldwide and that none of the largest environmental groups are talking about it.

fields.Title: Aladdin (1992)
fields.Summary: Aladdin is the 1992 Disney animated retelling of the classic Middle Eastern folktale Aladdin and the Wonderful Lamp

fields.Title: Inside Einstein's Mind: The Enigma of Space and Time
fields.Summary: Retrace the thought experiments that inspired his theory on the nature of reality.

fields.Title: The Ivory Games
fields.Summary: The Ivory Game, a stunning documentary film, highlights the ongoing devastation of the world's elephant population to supply the ivory market and international efforts to stop that destruction.

fields.Title: Dumbo (animated)
fields.Summary: Dumbo, Disney's short-and-sweet tale of a shy little circus elephant with supersized ears, is considered controversial because of its crow characters

fields.Title: Flint: The Poisoning of an American City
fields.Summary: Flint: The Poisoning of an American City is a documentary that tracks events leading up to and following the Flint River's contamination of a city's water supply, and the inaction of government authorities to respond to the crisis.

fields.Title: Chasing Coral
fields.Summary: Look into the phenomenon of disappearing coral reefs with a team of divers who try to solve the mystery of their disappearance.

fields.Title: 72 Cutest Animals
fields.Summary: A countdown of the cutest animals in the world introduces you to 72 adorable creatures.

fields.Title: If You Build It
fields.Summary: If You Build It is an inspiring documentary that shows just what can happen if you empower young people.

fields.Title: Cars 2
fields.Summary: Cars 2 is the fast-paced sequel to Pixar's hit movie Cars

fields.Title: The Whole Gritty City
fields.Summary: The Whole Gritty City is a documentary about three New Orleans marching bands made up of kids and teens.

fields.Title: I Am Santa Clause
fields.Summary: Am Santa is a documentary that colorfully depicts one year in the lives of five Santa Clauses.

fields.Title: Fed Up
fields.Summary: Fed Up is a documentary that focuses on the harm sugar does in the body.

fields.Title: G-Dog
fields.Summary: G-Dog is a documentary film about Father Gregory Boyle, a Jesuit priest who works with former gang members in Los Angeles, California.

fields.Title: The Magic School Bus
fields.Summary: An eccentric school-teacher takes her class on wondrous educational field trips with the help of a magical school bus.

fields.Title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
fields.Summary: Ralph Breaks the Internet -- the sequel to Disney's hit video-game comedy Wreck-It Ralph -- tells a strong friendship story within its framework of video game characters, popular websites, and social media platforms.

fields.Title: Legends of the Knight
fields.Summary: Legends of the Knight is a documentary about some of the men, women, and kids whose lives have been positively affected by both the concept and the persona of Batman

fields.Title: Kindness is Contageous
fields.Summary: Kindness Is Contagious is an engaging, feel-good documentary that compiles research, statistics, anecdotes, and theories about the effect of good deeds, featuring the author of the book-turned-film Pay it Forward, Catherine Ryan Hyde.

fields.Title: City in the Sky
fields.Summary: Delve into modern air travel and the many facets that make it run.

fields.Title: Born in China
fields.Summary: Venturing into the wilds of China, "Born in China" captures intimate moments with a panda and her growing cub, a young golden monkey who feels displaced by his baby sister, and a mother snow leopard struggling to raise her two cubs.

fields.Title: The Incredibles
fields.Summary: The Incredibles is an animated superhero adventure
